title: Bring back Rengar's ability to cast e mid air instantly {{champion:107}}
body:
Hi, after playing a game with Rengar on [update 6.2], I believe that he has lost some potential due to his e not being able to cast instantly mid-air anymore. So that means trying to combo won't be the same as before due to this. Please return his e to instant cast, thanks.


i'm so salty.{{champion:107}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3074}}

replies.body: Frankly these nerfs are necessary. If someone like Rengar can insta-pop a SHEN building full tank then his kit is fundamentally flawed. The E change is necessary to allow counterplay.

rengo can still instantly melt a adc's face off before he gets a 2nd hit off (or 4th with kogmaw) and theres little anybody can do to stop this, im glad he loses some of his instant kill combo but that still isnt enough to fully nerf him
